GSP29nysvbh_u:897: tadidaṃ hetūdāharaṇayoḥ sāmarthyaṃ paramasūkṣmaṃ duḥkhabodhaṃ paṇḍitarūpavedanīyamiti //37//

GSP29nysvbh_u:946: kasya cāpadeśātpratijñāyāḥ punarvacanaṃ nigamanaṃ syāt iti?

GSP29nysvbh_u:953: udāharaṇena samānasya viparītasya vā sādhyasya dharmasya sādhakabhāvavacanaṃ hetvarthaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh_u:957: na caitasyāṃ hetūdāharaṇapariśuddhau satyāṃ sādharmyavaidharmyābhyāṃ pratyavasthānasya vikalpājjātinigrahasthānabahutvaṃ prakramate/
GSP29nysvbh_u:958: avyavasthāpya khalu dharmayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvamudāharaṇe jātivādī pratyavatiṣṭhate/

GSP29nysvbh_u:1054: anyathobhāvapi pakṣau sthāpanāhetunā pravṛttau vāda iti syāt/

GSP29nysvbh_u:2415: yadidam 'anyat' iti manyase tat svātmano 'nanyatvādanyanna bhavati evamanyatāyā abhāvaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh_u:2421: anyasmād anyatāmupapādayati bhavān upapādya ca anyat pratyācaṣṭe,
GSP29nysvbh_u:2422_0: 'ananyat' iti ca śabdamanujānāti. prayuṅkte ca 'ananyat' iti etat samāsapadam. anyaśabdoyaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:2422_1: pratiṣedhena saha samasyate. yadi cātrottaraṃ padaṃ nāsti kasyāyaṃ pratiṣedhenana saha samāsaḥ ?
GSP29nysvbh_u:2423: , tasmāt tayoranyānanyaśabdayoritaro 'nanyaśabda itaramanyaśabdamapekṣamāṇaḥ sidhyatīti tatra yaduktam-- 'anyatāyā abhāvaḥ' iti etadayuktamiti // 32 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2428: yadanityaṃ tasya vināśaḥ kāraṇād bhavati yathā loṣṭasya kāraṇadravyavibhāgāt,
GSP29nysvbh_u:2429: śabdaścedanityastasya vināśo yasmātkāraṇād bhavati tadupalabhyeta na copalabhyate tasmānnitya iti // 33 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2438: samānaśca dṛṣṭavirodho nimittamantareṇa vināśe cāśrivaṇe ceti // 34 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2442: anumānāccopalabhyamāne śabdasya vināśakaraṇe 'bavanāśakāraṇānupalabdheḥ = asattvāt' ityanapadeśaḥ yathā 'yasmādviṣāṇī tasmādaśvaḥ' iti/
GSP29nysvbh_u:2445: upapāditaḥ śabdasaṃtānaḥ-- saṃyogavibhāgajāt śabdācchabdāntaraṃ tatopyanyat tatopyanyaditi,
GSP29nysvbh_u:2446: tatra kāryaḥ śabdaḥ kāraṇaśabdaṃ viruṇaddhi. pratighātidravyasaṃyogastu antyasya śabdasya nirodhakaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh_u:2447: dṛṣṭaṃ hi tiraḥpratikuḍyamantikasthenāpyaśravaṇaṃ śabdasya śravaṇaṃ dūrasthenāpyasati vyavadhāne iti/
GSP29nysvbh_u:2448: ghaṇṭāyāmabhihanyamānāyāṃ tārastārataro mando mandatara iti śrutibhedād nānāśabdasaṃtāno 'vicchedena śrūyate,
GSP29nysvbh_u:2449: tatra nitye śabde ghaṇṭāsthamanyagataṃ vāvasthitaṃ saṃtānavṛtti vā abhivyaktikāraṇaṃ vācyaṃ yena śrutisaṃtāno bhavatīti,
GSP29nysvbh_u:2451_0: anitye tu śabde ghaṇṭāsthaṃ saṃtānavṛtti saṃyogasahakāri nimittāntaraṃ saṃskārabhūtaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:2454: na vai nirnimittāntaraṃ saṃskāra upalabhyate anupalabdhernāstīti---
GSP29nysvbh_u:2456: pāṇikarmaṇā pāṇighaṇṭāpraśleṣo bhavati tasmiṃśca sati śabdasaṃtāno nopalabhyate ataḥ śravaṇānupapattiḥ,
GSP29nysvbh_u:2457: tatra pratighātidravyasaṃyogaḥ śabdasya nimittāntaraṃ saṃskārabhūtaṃ niruṇaddhītyanumīyate. tasya ca nirodhāt śabdasaṃtāno notpadyate anutpanne ca śrutivicchedaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh_u:2458: yathā pratighātidravyasaṃyogādiṣoḥ kriyāhetau saṃskāre niruddhe gamanābhāva iti/
GSP29nysvbh_u:2459: kampasaṃtānasya sparśanendriyagrāhyasya coparamaḥ kāṃsyapātrādiṣu pāṇisaṃśleṣo liṅgaṃ saṃskārasaṃtānasyeti,
GSP29nysvbh_u:2464: yadi yasya vināśakāraṇaṃ nopalabhyate tadavatiṣṭhate avasthānācca tasya nityatvaṃ prasajyate ?
GSP29nysvbh_u:2465: evaṃ yāni khalpimāni śabdaśravaṇāni śabdābhivyaktaya iti mataṃ na teṣāṃ vināśakāraṇaṃ bhavatopapādyate anupapādanādavasthānam avasthānāt teṣāṃ nityatvaṃ prasajyate iti,
GSP29nysvbh_u:2473: yadidam 'nākāśaguṇaḥ śabdaḥ' iti pratiṣidhyate. ayamanupapannaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ-- asparśatvāt śabdāśrayasya,
GSP29nysvbh_u:2474: rūpādisamānadeśasyāgrahaṇe śabdasaṃtānopapatterasparśavyāpidravyāśrayaḥ śabdaḥ iti jñāyate na ca kampasamānāśraya iti // 38 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2477: pratidravyaṃ rūpādibhiḥ saha saṃniviṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ samānadeśo vyajyate iti nopapadyate/
GSP29nysvbh_u:2482: yadi rūpādayaḥ śabdaśca pratidravyaṃ samastāḥusamuditāstasmin samāsasamudāye yo yathājātīyakaḥ saṃniviṣṭastasya tathājātīyasyaiva grahaṇena bhavitavyaṃ śabdasya rūpādivat,
GSP29nysvbh_u:2483_0: tatra yo 'yaṃ vibhāgaḥ eka dravye nānārūpā bhinnaśrutayo vidharmāṇaḥ śabdaḥ abhivyajyamānāḥ
GSP29nysvbh_u:2483_1: yacca vibhāgāntaraṃ sarūpāḥ samānaśrutayaḥ sadharmāṇaḥ śabdāḥ tīvramandadharmatayā
GSP29nysvbh_u:2483_2: bhinnāḥ śrūyante. tadubhayaṃ nopapadyate-- nānābhūtānāmutpadyamānānāmayaṃ dharmo
GSP29nysvbh_u:2484: asti cāyaṃ vibhāgo vibhāgāntaraṃ ca tena vibhāgopapattermanyāmahe-- na pratidravyaṃ rūpādibhiḥ saha śabdaḥ saṃniviṣṭo vyajyate iti // 39 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2487: dvividhaścāyaṃ śabdaḥ-- varṇātmako dhvanimātraśca tatra varṇātmani tāvat---
GSP29nysvbh_u:2489: 'dadhyatra' iti kecid ikāraḥ itvaṃ hitvā yatvamāpadyate iti vikāraṃ manyante,
GSP29nysvbh_u:2490: kecid ikārasya prayoge viṣayakṛte yad ikāraḥ sthānaṃ jahāti tatra yakārasya prayogaṃ bruvate,
GSP29nysvbh_u:2491: saṃhitāyāṃ viṣaye ikāro na prayujyate tasya sthāne yakāraḥ prayujyate sa ādeśa iti,
GSP29nysvbh_u:2492: ubhayamidamupadiśyate tatra na jñāyate kiṃ tattvamiti //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2494: satyanvaye kiñcid nivartate kiñcidupajāyate iti śakyeta vikāro 'numātuṃ na cānvayo gṛhyate tasmād vikāro nāstīti//
GSP29nysvbh_u:2496: vivṛtakaraṇa ikāraḥ īṣatspṛṣṭakaraṇo yakāraḥ tāvimau pṛthak karaṇākhyena prayatnenoccāraṇīyau tayorekasyāprayoge 'nyasya prayoga upapanna iti//
GSP29nysvbh_u:2498: yatremau ikārayakārau na vikārabhūtau-- 'yatate. cachati. prāyaṃmta' iti. 'ikāraḥ idam' iti ca,
GSP29nysvbh_u:2499: yatra ca vikārabhūtau-- 'dṛṣṭyā' 'dadhyāhara' iti ubhayatra prayokturaviśeṣo yatnaḥ śrotuśca śrutiratyādeśopipattiḥ //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2501: na khalu ikāraḥ prayujyamāno yakāratāmāpadyamāno gṛhyate, kiṃ tarhi ?
GSP29nysvbh_u:2502: . ikārasya prayoge yakāraḥ prayujyate. tasmādavikāra iti //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2505: na caitasmin pakṣe śabdānvākhyānasyāsaṃbhavo yena varṇavikāraṃ pratipadyemahīti/
GSP29nysvbh_u:2506: na khalu varṇasya varṇāntaraṃ kāryam-- na hi ikārād yakāra utpadyate yakārādvā ikāraḥ,
GSP29nysvbh_u:2507: pṛthaksthānaprayatnotpādyā hīme varṇāsteṣāmanyo 'nyasya sthāne prayujyate iti yuktam/
GSP29nysvbh_u:2508: etāvaccaitat paraṇāmo vikāraḥ syāt kāryakāraṇabhāvo vā,
GSP29nysvbh_u:2509: ubhayaṃ ca nāsti tasmānna santi varṇavikāraḥ //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2511_1: varṇāntarasamudāyo na paraṇāmo ni kāryaṃ śabdāntarasya sthāne śabdāntaraṃ prayujyate
GSP29nysvbh_u:2516: prakṛtyanuvidhānaṃ vikāreṣu dṛṣṭaṃ yakāre hasvadīrghānuvidhānaṃ nāsti yena vikāratvamanumīyata iti // 41 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2520: davyavikārā nyūnāḥ samā adhikāśca gṛhyante. tadvadayaṃ vikāro nyūnaḥ syāditi/
GSP29nysvbh_u:2521: dvividhasyāpi hetor abhāvād asādhanaṃ dṛṣṭāntaḥ-- atra nodāharaṇasādharmyād heturasti na vaidharmyāt. anupasaṃhṛtaśca hetunā dṛṣṭānto na sādhaka iti //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2523: yathānaḍuhaḥ sthāne 'śvo voḍuṃ niyukto na tadvikāro bhavati. evamivarṇasya sthāne yakāraḥ prayukto na vikāra iti/
GSP29nysvbh_u:2524: na cātra niyamaheturasti-- dṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhako na pratidṛṣṭānta iti // 42 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2529: atulyānāṃ dravyāṇāṃ prakṛtibhāvo vikalpane vikāraśca prakṛtīranuvidhīyate,
GSP29nysvbh_u:2534: yathā dravyabhāvena tulyāyāḥ prakṛtervikāravaiṣamyam evaṃ varṇabhāvena tulyāyāḥ prakṛtervikāravikalpa iti // 44 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2538: ayaṃ vikāradharmaḥ-- dravyasāmānye yadātmakaṃ dravyaṃ mṛdvā suvarṇaṃ vā tasyātmano 'nvaye pūrvo vyūho nivartate vyūhāntaraṃ copajāyate taṃ vikāramācakṣate,
GSP29nysvbh_u:2539: na varṇasāmānye kaścid śabdātmānvayī ya itvaṃ jahāti yatvaṃ cāpadyate,
GSP29nysvbh_u:2540: tatra yathā sati dravyabhāve vikāravaiṣamye nānaḍuho 'śvo vikāraḥ-- vikāradharmānupapatteḥ,
GSP29nysvbh_u:2549: na punarikāsya sthāne yakārasya prayoga ityatrānumānaṃ nāsti ? // 46 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2553: ananumānāditi na-- idaṃ hyanumānam-- suvarṇaṃ kuṇḍalatvaṃ hitvā rucakatvamāpadyate rucakatvaṃ hitvā punaḥ kuṇḍalatvamāpadyate,
GSP29nysvbh_u:2555: vyabhicārādananumānam-- yathā payo dadhibhāvamāpannaṃ punaḥ payo na bhavati-- kimevaṃ varṇānāṃ na punarāpattiḥ ?
GSP29nysvbh_u:2561_0: avasthitaṃ suvarṇaṃ hīyamānenopajāyamānena ca dharmeṇa dharmi bhavati naivaṃ kaścit
GSP29nysvbh_u:2561_1: śabdātmā hīyamānena itvena upajāyamānena yatvena ca dharmī gṛhyate tasmāt suvarṇodāharaṇaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:2565: varṇavikārā api varṇatvaṃ na vyabhicaranti yathā suvarṇavikāraḥ suvarṇatvamiti // 49 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2569: kuṇḍalarucakau suvarṇasya dharmauṃ na suvarṇatvasya. evamikārayakārau kasya varṇātmano dharmauṃ ?
GSP29nysvbh_u:2570: varṇatvaṃ sāmānyaṃ na tasyemau dharmauṃ bhavitumarhataḥ,
GSP29nysvbh_u:2571: na ca nivartamāno dharma upajāyamānasya prakṛtiḥutatra nivartamāna ikāro na yakārasyopajāyamānasya prakṛtiriti // 50 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2576: 'nityā varṇāḥ' ityetasminṛ pakṣe ikārayakārau varṇauṃ ityubhayornityatvād vikārānupapattiḥ,
GSP29nysvbh_u:2582: utpadya niruddhe ikāre yakāra utpadyate. yakāre cotpadya niruddhe ikāra utpadyate,
GSP29nysvbh_u:2584: tadetad avagṛhya saṃdhāne. saṃdhāya cāvagrahe veditavyamiti // 51 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2590: yathā nityatve sati kiñcidatīndriyaṃ kiñcidinrdiyagrāhyam indriyagrāhyāśca varṇāḥ. evaṃ nityatve sati kiñcinana vikriyate varṇāstu vikriyante iti //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2611: tatra yādṛgidam-- yathā gandhaguṇā pṛthivī evaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:2625: iti na yuktaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ-- na khalu vikāradharmakaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:2628: iti ( ca ) na yuktaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ-- avagrahe hi 'dadhi atra'
GSP29nysvbh_u:2629: iti prayujya ciraṃ sthitvā tataḥ saṃhitāyāṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:2631: yakāraḥ prayujyamānaḥ kasya vikāra iti pratīyate ? /
GSP29nysvbh_u:2657: niyama ityatrārthābhyanujñā. aniyama iti tasya pratiṣedhaḥ. anujñātatiṣiddhayośca vyāghātādanarthāntaratvaṃ na bhavati.
GSP29nysvbh_u:2671: prayogo vikāraśabdārthaḥ sa bhidyate-- guṇānatarāpattiḥ = udāttasyānudatta ityevamādiḥ, upamarde
GSP29nysvbh_u:2678: vikārā iti ete evādeśāḥ. ete cedvikārā
GSP29nysvbh_u:2683: yathādarśanaṃ vikṛtā varṇā vibhaktyantāḥ padasaṃjñā bhavanti/
GSP29nysvbh_u:2701: prayujyate tatra na jñāyate-- kimanyatamaḥ padārthaḥ ?
GSP29nysvbh_u:2715: 'gavāṃ samūhaḥ' iti bhedād dravyābhidhānaṃ. na jāteḥ--
GSP29nysvbh_u:2716: abhedāt, 'vaidyāya gāṃ dadātīti dravyasya tyāgo. na jāteḥ-- amūrtatvāt pratikramānukramānupapatteśca,
GSP29nysvbh_u:2733: tad utpattidharmatvād dravye yuktaṃ. na jātau--
GSP29nysvbh_u:2746: kiṃ tarhi ?. jātiviśiṣṭaṃ. tasmānna vyaktiḥ padārthaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh_u:2750: yadi na vyaktiḥ padārthaḥ kathaṃ tarhi
GSP29nysvbh_u:2780: yadi 'gauḥ' ityasya padasya na vyaktirarthaḥ ? astu tarhi---
GSP29nysvbh_u:2784_0: sattvāvayavānāṃ tadavayavānāṃ ca niyato vyūha ākṛtiḥ tasyāṃ gṛhyamāṇāyāṃ sattvavyavasthānaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:2784_1: sidhyati-- 'ayaṃ gauḥ' 'ayamaśvaḥ' iti. nāgṛhyamāṇāyām. yasya grahaṇāt sattvavyavasthānaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:2786: naitadupapadyate-- yasya jātyā yogastadatra jātiviśiṣṭamabhidhīyate-- 'gauḥ' iti. na cāvayavavyūhasya jātyā yogaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh_u:2793: NyS_2,2.65: vyaktyākṛtiyukte 'py aprasaṃgāt prokṣaṇādīnāṃ mṛdgavake jātiḥ //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2809: śuddhaṃ gṛhyate tasmānna jātiḥ padārtha iti // 66 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2819: tadā vyaktiḥ pradhānamaṅgaṃ tu jātyākṛtī. yadā
GSP29nysvbh_u:2832: indriyagrāhyeti. na sarvaṃ dravyaṃ vyaktiḥ, yo
GSP29nysvbh_u:2841: tāmākṛtiṃ vidyāt. sā ca nānyā sattvāvayavānāṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:2846: niyate ca sattvāvayavānāṃ vyūhe sati gotvaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:2857: yacca keṣāṃ cidabhedaṃ keṣāñcid bhedaṃ karoti tat sāmānyaviśeṣo jātiriti // 70 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2859: // iti vātsyāyanīye nyāyabhāṣye dvitīyādhyāyasya dvitīyamāhnikaṃ samāptam //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2863: parīkṣitāni pramāṇāni prameyamidānīṃ parīkṣyate-- taccātmādīti ātmā vivicyate-- kiṃ dehendriyamanobuddhivedanāsaṃghātamātramātmā ?
GSP29nysvbh_u:2867: kriyākaraṇayoḥ kartrā saṃbandhasyābhidhānaṃ vyapadeśaḥ sa dvividhaḥ-- avayavena samudāyasya-- 'mūlairvṛkṣastiṣṭhati' 'stambhaiḥ prāsādo dhriyate' iti,
GSP29nysvbh_u:2869: , asti cāyaṃ vyapadeśaḥ-- 'cakṣuṣā paśyati' 'manasā vijānāti' 'buddhyā vicārayati' 'śarīreṇa sukhaduḥkhamanubhavatīti,
GSP29nysvbh_u:2878: darśanena yāvadartho gṛhītaḥ sparśanenāpi so 'rtho gṛhyate-- 'yamahamadrākṣaṃ cakṣuṣā taṃ sparśanenāpi spṛśāmi,
GSP29nysvbh_u:2879: iti. 'yaṃ cāspārkṣaṃ sparśanena taṃ cakṣuṣā paśyāmīti ekaviṣayau cermā pratyayau ekakartṛkau pratisaṃdhīyete. na ca saṃghātakartṛkau. na (vā)
GSP29nysvbh_u:2881: tad yo 'sau cakṣuṣā tvagindriyeṇa caikārthasya grahītā bhinnanimittau ananyakartṛkau pratyayau samānaviṣayau pratisaṃdadhāti so 'rthāntarabhūta ātmā/
GSP29nysvbh_u:2883: . indriyaṃ khalu svaṃ svaṃ viṣayagrahaṇam ananyakartṛkaṃ pratisaṃdhātumarhati nendriyāntarasya viṣayāntaragrahaṇamiti/
GSP29nysvbh_u:2885: . ekaḥ khalvayaṃ bhinnanimittau svātmakartṛkau pratyayau pratisaṃhitau vedayate na saṃghātaḥ, kasmāt ?
GSP29nysvbh_u:2886: . anivṛttaṃ hi saṃghāte pratyekaṃ viṣayāntaragrahaṇasyāpratisaṃdhānam indriyāntareṇeveti // 1 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2892: vyavasthitaviṣayāṇīndriyāṇi-- cakṣuṣy asati rūpaṃ na gṛhyate sati ca gṛhyate. yacca yasminn asati na bhavati sati ( ca )
GSP29nysvbh_u:2894: tasmād rūpagrahaṇaṃ cakṣuṣaḥ cakṣū rūpaṃ paśyati,
GSP29nysvbh_u:2896: tānīndriyāṇīmāni svasvaviṣayagrahaṇāt cetanāni-- indriyāṇāṃ bhāvābhāvayorviṣayagrahaṇasya tathābhāvāt,
GSP29nysvbh_u:2899: yo 'yamindriyāṇāṃ bhāvābhāvayorviṣayagrahaṇasya tathāl̃āvaḥ sa kiṃ cetanatvāt ?
GSP29nysvbh_u:2909: sarvaviṣayagrāhi cetanaṃ syāt kastato 'nyaṃ cetanamanumātuṃ śaknuyāt,
GSP29nysvbh_u:2912_0: tatredaṃ pratyabhijñānam apratyākhyeyaṃ cetanavṛttamudāhriyate-- rūpadarśī khalvayaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:2912_1: rasaṃ gandhaṃ vā pūrvagṛhītamanuminoti. gandhaprativedī ca rūparasāv anuminoti. evaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:2913: rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā gandhaṃ jighrati. ghrātvā ca gandha rūpaṃ paśyati. tadevamaniyataparyāyaṃ sarvaviṣayagrahaṇam ekacetanādhikaraṇam ananyakartṛkaṃ pratisaṃdhatte,
GSP29nysvbh_u:2914: pratyakṣānumānāgamasaṃśayān pratyayāṃśca nānāviṣayān svātmakartṛkān pratisaṃdadhāti pratisaṃdhāya vedayate,
GSP29nysvbh_u:2915: sarvārthaviṣayaṃ ca śāstraṃ pratipadyate. arthamaviṣayabhūtaṃ śrotrasya,
GSP29nysvbh_u:2916: kramabhāvino varṇān śrutvā padavākayabhāvaṃ pratisaṃdhāya śabdārthavyavasthāṃ ca budhyamāno 'nekaviṣayamarthajātamagrahaṇīyamekaikenendriyeṇa gṛhṇāti,
GSP29nysvbh_u:2917: seyaṃ sarvajñasya jñeyāvyavasthānupadaṃ na śakyā parikramitum/

GSP29nysvbh_u:2928: evaṃ sati yo dehādisaṃghātaḥ prāṇibhūto hiṃsā karoti nāsau hiṃsāphalena saṃbadhyate. yaśca saṃbadhyate na tena hiṃsā kṛtā,
GSP29nysvbh_u:2930: sati ca sattvotpāde. sattvanirodhe cākarmanimittaḥ sattvasargaḥ prāpnoti tatra muktyartho brahmacaryavāso na syāt/
GSP29nysvbh_u:2931: tad yadi dehādisaṃghātamātraṃ sattvaṃ syāt śarīradāhe pātakaṃ na bhavet. aniṣṭaṃ caitat. tasmād dehādisaṃghātavyatirikta ātmā nitya iti // 4 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2935: yasyāpi nityenātmanā sātmakaṃ śarīraṃ dahyate tasyāpi śarīradāhe pātakaṃ na bhaved dagdhuḥ, kasmāt ?
GSP29nysvbh_u:2940: seyamekasmin pakṣe hiṃsā niṣphalā. anyasmiṃstv anupapanneti // 5 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:2944: na brūmaḥ-- nityasya sattvasya vadho hiṃsā api tvanucchitidharmakasya sattvasya kāryāśrayasya śarīrasya svaviṣayopalabdheśca kartṝṇāmindriyāṇāmupaghātaḥ /
GSP29nysvbh_u:2955: yasya sattvocchedo hiṃsā tasya kṛtahānamakṛtābhyāgamaśceti doṣaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh_u:2956: etāvaccaitat syāt-- sattvocchedo vā hiṃsā anucchittidharmakasya sattvasya kāryāśrayakartṛvadho
GSP29nysvbh_u:2965: utadāyatanaṃ tad bhavati na tato 'nyaditi sa eva kartā-- tannimittā
GSP29nysvbh_u:2968: pīḍā pramāpaṇaṃ vā hiṃsā na nityatvenātmocchedaḥ,
GSP29nysvbh_u:3015: mṛtasya hi śaraḥkapāle dvāv avaṭau nāsāsthivyavahitau
GSP29nysvbh_u:3016: cakṣuṣaḥ sthāne bhedena gṛhyete na caitad ekasmin
GSP29nysvbh_u:3018: atha caikavināśasyāniyamād dvāvimāvārthau tau ca pṛthagāvaraṇopaghātau
GSP29nysvbh_u:3031: gandhe vā kena cidindriyeṇa gṛhyamāṇe rasanasyendriyāntarasya
GSP29nysvbh_u:3045: ātmanaḥ = yadi smṛtirātmaguṇaḥ evaṃ sati smṛtirupapadyate--
GSP29nysvbh_u:3071: sarvatra khalu jñātā jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ ca gṛhyate/ atha
GSP29nysvbh_u:3086: na cedaṃ smṛtimātraṃ smartavyamātraviṣayaṃ vā, idaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:3088: ekasya sarvaviṣayatvāt = eko 'yaṃ jñātā sarvaviṣayaḥ svāni jñānāni
GSP29nysvbh_u:3102: smṛtiprabandhaṃ ca pratisaṃdhatte iti. yasya dehāntareṣu
GSP29nysvbh_u:3122: spṛśati' evaṃ mantuḥ sarvaviṣayasya matisādhanam antaḥkaraṇabhūtaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:3124: evaṃ sati jñātaryātmasaṃjñā na mṛṣyate manaḥsaṃjñābhyanujñāyate.
GSP29nysvbh_u:3125: manasi ca manaḥsaṃjñā na mṛṣyate matisādhanasaṃjñā
GSP29nysvbh_u:3144: gṛhyate iti karaṇāntaraṃ ghrāṇam evaṃ cakṣurghrāṇābhyāṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:3145: raso na gṛhyate iti karaṇāntaraṃ rasanam
GSP29nysvbh_u:3148: na gṛhyante iti karaṇāntareṇa bhavitavyaṃ tacca
GSP29nysvbh_u:3196: na nivartate. yathā ceyaṃ na nivartate tathā
GSP29nysvbh_u:3207: uṣṇādiṣu satsu bhāvād asatsvabhāvād tannimittāḥ pañcabhūtānugraheṇa
GSP29nysvbh_u:3222: jātamātrasya vatsasya pravṛttiliṅgaḥ stanyābhilāṣo gṛhyate sa ca nāntareṇāhārābhyāsam/
GSP29nysvbh_u:3286: teṣu teṣu rajyate. tathā cāyaṃ dvayorjanmanoḥ
GSP29nysvbh_u:3338: pṛthivyādīni bhūtāni saṃkhyāvikalpena śarīraprakṛtiriti pratijānata iti/
GSP29nysvbh_u:3366: śarīram agandham arasam arūpam asparśaṃ ca prakṛtyanuvidhānāt syāt.
GSP29nysvbh_u:3372: “sūryaṃ te cakṣurgacchatām” ityatra mantre “pṛthivīṃ te śarīram“
GSP29nysvbh_u:3373: iti śrūyate tadidaṃ prakṛtau vikārasya pralayābhidhānamiti/
GSP29nysvbh_u:3374: “sūryaṃ te cakṣuḥ spṛṇomi” ityatra mantrāntare “pṛthivīṃ te śarīraṃ spṛṇomi” iti śrūyate seyaṃ kāraṇād vikārasya spṛttirabhidhīyate iti/
GSP29nysvbh_u:3386: kṛṣṇasāraṃ bhautikaṃ tasminn anupahate rūpopalabdhiḥ upahate cānupalabdhiriti,
GSP29nysvbh_u:3437: saha rūpeṇa nopalabhyate sparśastv asyoṣṇa upalabhnapayate
GSP29nysvbh_u:3444: yatra rūpaṃ ca dravyaṃ ca tadāśrayaḥ pratyakṣata
GSP29nysvbh_u:3450: nāyano raśmiḥ tasmāt pratyakṣato nopalabhyate iti/
GSP29nysvbh_u:3480: pratighātaḥ sa bhautikadharmaḥ-- na bhūtāni vyabhicarati.
GSP29nysvbh_u:3561: na vyavahitasya saṃnikarṣa ity agrahaṇaṃ syāt,
GSP29nysvbh_u:3598: prāptiḥ prāptau tu dāhaḥ-- nāprāpyakāri teja
GSP29nysvbh_u:3642: bhavata' iti. nāpi pratiṣeddhum-- 'evaṃ na bhavata'
GSP29nysvbh_u:3654: svo dharma iti tathābhūtāḥ pramāṇena pratipadyante
GSP29nysvbh_u:3659: mā bhūt. iti, na-- dṛṣṭānumitāḥ khalvime
GSP29nysvbh_u:3685: ca satyāṃ viṣayagrahaṇaṃ bhavati sā tvagekamindriyamiti // 52 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:3707: cābhāvāt. tathā ca pūrvo vāda uttareṇa vādena
GSP29nysvbh_u:3719: yugapad grahaṇāni syuḥ na ca yugapad rūpādayo
GSP29nysvbh_u:3730: tvacā rūpāṇy aprāptāni gṛhyante iti aprāpyakāritve
GSP29nysvbh_u:3733: ca prāptānāṃ grahaṇād rūpādīnām ( api ) prāptānāṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:3736: āvaraṇānupapatterviṣayamātrasya grahaṇam = athāpi manyeta-- prāptāḥ sparśādayastvacā
GSP29nysvbh_u:3743: aprāptaṃ tvacā gṛhyate rūpamiti dūre rūpasyāgrahaṇamantike
GSP29nysvbh_u:3755: na gandho gṛhyate iti gandhagrahaṇaprayojanaṃ ghrāṇamanumīyate,
GSP29nysvbh_u:3756: trayāṇāṃ grahaṇe na taireva raso gṛhyate
GSP29nysvbh_u:3758: na caturṇāṃ grahaṇe taireva śabdaḥ śrūyate iti
GSP29nysvbh_u:3882: yasya bhūtasya ye guṇā na te tadātmakenendriyeṇa
GSP29nysvbh_u:3884: pārthivena hi ghrāṇena sparśaparyantā na gṛhyante
GSP29nysvbh_u:3913: viṣṭam ato na saṃsargāniyama iti. taccaitad
GSP29nysvbh_u:3922: taijasameva dravyaṃ pratyakṣaṃ syāt. na pārthivamāpyaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:3924: taijasavattu pārthivāpyayoḥ pratyakṣatvād na saṃsargādanekaguṇagrahaṇaṃ bhūtānāmiti/
GSP29nysvbh_u:3929: pārthivo rasaḥ ṣaḍvidhaḥ āpyo madhura eva na caitat saṃsargād bhavitumarhati/
GSP29nysvbh_u:3931: taijasarūpānugṛhītayoḥ saṃsarge hi vyañjakameva rūpaṃ na vyaṅgyamastīti/
GSP29nysvbh_u:3933: pārthivaṃ haritalohitapītādyanekavidhaṃ rūpam āpyaṃ tu śuklamaprakāśakaṃ na caitadekaguṇānāṃ saṃsarge satyupalabhyate iti/
GSP29nysvbh_u:3942: tasya kāryaṃ liṅm-- kāraṇabhāvāddhi kāryabhāva iti/
GSP29nysvbh_u:3948: gṛhyate āpyaṃ ca parābhyāṃ taijasaṃ ca vāyunā,
GSP29nysvbh_u:3953: nātra liṅgamanumāpakaṃ gṛhyate iti yenaitadevaṃ pratipadyemahi/
GSP29nysvbh_u:3954: yaccoktam-- 'viṣṭaṃ hyaparaṃ pareṇeti bhūtasṛṣṭau veditavyaṃ na sāṃpratam' iti
GSP29nysvbh_u:3960: saṃyogaḥ saca dvayoḥ samānaḥ, vāyunā ca
GSP29nysvbh_u:3961: viṣṭatvāt sparśavat tejaḥ na tu tejasā
GSP29nysvbh_u:3993: kiṅkṛtaṃ punarvyavasthānaṃ kiñcit pārthivamindriyaṃ na sarvāṇi ?
GSP29nysvbh_u:3997: arthanirvṛttisamarthasya pravibhaktasya dravyasya saṃsargaḥ puruṣasaṃskārakārito bhūyastvam,
GSP29nysvbh_u:4014: saha bāhyaṃ gandhaṃ gṛhṇāti tasya svagandhagrahaṇaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:4019: yadi punargandhaḥ sahakārī ca syād ghrāṇasya ?
GSP29nysvbh_u:4023: yo brūte-- yathā bāhyaṃ dravyaṃ cakṣuṣāṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:4031: bhavati-- upalabhyate hi svaguṇaḥ śabdaḥ śrotreṇeti // 72 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:4058: buddheridānīṃ parīkṣākramaḥ-- sā kimanityā nityā vā ? iti/
GSP29nysvbh_u:4061: asparśavattvaṃ tābhyāṃ samāno dharma upalabhyate buddhau. viśeṣaścopajanāpāyadharmavattvam,
GSP29nysvbh_u:4062: viparyayaśca yathāsvamanityanityayostasyāṃ buddhau nopalabhyate tena saṃśaya iti //
GSP29nysvbh_u:4063: anupapannaḥ khalvayaṃ saṃśayaḥ-- sarvaśarīriṇāṃ hi pratyātmavedanīyānityā buddhiḥ sukhādivat. bhavati ca saṃvittiḥ-- 'jñāsyāmi' 'jānāmi' 'ajñāsiṣam' iti,
GSP29nysvbh_u:4064: na copajanāpāyāvantareṇa traikālyavyaktistataśca traikālyavyakteḥ 'anityā buddhiḥ' ityetat siddham,
GSP29nysvbh_u:4070: dṛṣṭipravādopālambhārthaṃ tu prakaraṇam. evaṃ hi paśyantaḥ pravadanti sāṃkhyāḥ-- 'puruṣasyāntaḥkaraṇabhūtā nityā buddhiḥ' iti // 1 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:4076_1: etaccāvasthitāyā buddherupapannam. nānātve tu buddhibhedeṣūtpannāpavargiṣu pratyabhijñānānupapattiḥ--
GSP29nysvbh_u:4080: yathā khalu nityatvaṃ buddheḥ sādhyam evaṃ pratyabhijñānamapīti/
GSP29nysvbh_u:4082_0: . cetanadharmasya karaṇe 'nupapattiḥ-- puruṣadharmaḥ khalvayaṃ jñānaṃ darśanamupalabdhirbodhaḥ
GSP29nysvbh_u:4082_1: pratyayo 'dhyavasāya iti-- cetano hi pūrvajñātamarthaṃ pratyabhijānāti tasyaitasmād
GSP29nysvbh_u:4083: karaṇacaitanyābhyupagame tu cetanasvarūpaṃ vacanīyam-- nānirdiṣṭasvarūpamātmāntaraṃ śakyamastīti pratipattum/
GSP29nysvbh_u:4084: jñānaṃ ced buddherantaḥkaraṇasyābhyupagamyate cetanasyedānīṃ kiṃ svarūpaṃ ko dharmaḥ kiṃ tattvam,
GSP29nysvbh_u:4085: jñānena ca buddhau vartamānenāyaṃ cetanaḥ kiṃ karorīti //
GSP29nysvbh_u:4088: puruṣaścetayate buddhirjānātīti. nedaṃ jñānādarthāntaramucyate-- yetayate jānīte paśyati upalabhate ityekoyamartha iti/
GSP29nysvbh_u:4090: . addhā jānīte puruṣo buddhirjñāpayatīti satyametat. evaṃ cābhyupagame 'jñānaṃ puruṣasya' iti siddhaṃ bhavati na buddherantaḥkaraṇasyeti //
GSP29nysvbh_u:4093: yaśca pratijānīte-- kaścit puruṣaścetayate kaścid budhyate kaścidupalabhate kaścit paśyati iti puruṣānatarāṇi khalvimāni/
GSP29nysvbh_u:4094: cetano boddhā upalabdhā draṣṭeti naikasyeti dharmā iti,
GSP29nysvbh_u:4097: abhinnārthā ete śabdā iti tatra vyavasthānupapattirityevaṃ cet manyase ?
GSP29nysvbh_u:4101: yadi punarbudhyate 'nayeti bodhanaṃ buddhirmana evocyate tacca nityam ?
GSP29nysvbh_u:4102: astvetadevaṃ na tu manaso viṣayapratyabhijñānād nityatvam. dṛṣṭaṃ hi karaṇabhede jñāturekatvāt pratyabhijñānam-- savyadṛṣṭasyetareṇa pratyabhijñānāditi cakṣurvat. pradīpavacca /
GSP29nysvbh_u:4107: yacca manyate-- buddher avasthitāyā yathāviṣayaṃ vṛttayaḥ /
GSP29nysvbh_u:4108: jñānāni niścaranti vṛttiśca vṛttimato nānyeti. tacca---
GSP29nysvbh_u:4110: vṛttivṛttimatorananyatve vṛttimato 'vasthānād vṛttīnāmavasthānamiti yānīmāni viṣayagrahaṇāni tānyavatiṣṭhante iti yugapad viṣayāṇāṃ grahaṇaṃ prasajyate iti // 4 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:4114: atīte ca pratyabhijñāne vṛttimānapyatīta ityantaḥkaraṇasya vināśaḥ prasajyate,
GSP29nysvbh_u:4118: avibhu caikraṃ manaḥ paryāyeṇendriyaiḥ saṃyujyate iti---
GSP29nysvbh_u:4126: anupalabdhiḥ. anupalabdhiśca kasya cidarthasya viṣayāntaravyāsakte manasyupapadyate-- vṛttivṛttimatornānātvāt,
GSP29nysvbh_u:4133: gatyabhāvācca pratiṣiddhaṃ vibhuno 'ntaḥkaraṇasyāyugapadgrahaṇaṃ na liṅgāntareṇānumīyate iti,
GSP29nysvbh_u:4137: tasya nityatve-- siddhaṃ hi mano 'ntaḥkaraṇaṃ nityaṃ ceti/
GSP29nysvbh_u:4140: ekaṃ cāntaḥkaraṇaṃ nānā caitā jñānātmikā vṛttayaḥ-- cakṣurvijñānaṃ ghrāṇavijñānam /
GSP29nysvbh_u:4145: kena cidindriyeṇa saṃnidhiḥ kena cid asaṃnidhirityayaṃ tu vyāsaṅgo 'nujñāyate manasa iti // 8 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:4151: tasyāṃ vṛttau nānātvābhimānāṃ yathā dravyāntaropahite sphaṭike 'nyatvābhimāno 'nīlaḥ' 'lohitaḥ' iti. evaṃ viṣayāntaropadhānāditi //
GSP29nysvbh_u:4153: sphaṭikānyatvābhimānavadayaṃ jñāneṣu nānātvābhimāno gauṇaḥ na punargandhādyanyatvābhimānavaditi heturnāsti hetvabhāvādanupapanna iti/
GSP29nysvbh_u:4155: . na-- jñānānāṃ krameṇopajanāpāyadarśanātu krameṇa hīndriyārtheṣu jñānānyupajāyante
GSP29nysvbh_u:4166: usphaṭike 'py anyā vyaktaya utpadyante anyā nirudhyante
GSP29nysvbh_u:4185: kasmāt ?, hetvabhāvāt = nātra pratyakṣamanumānaṃ vā pratipādakamastīti,
GSP29nysvbh_u:4189: yathā śarīrādiṣu. yatra yatra na dṛśyate tatra
GSP29nysvbh_u:4204: yasya tv anapacitāvayavaṃ nirudhyate anupacitāvayavaṃ cotpadyate tasyāśeṣanirodhe
GSP29nysvbh_u:4217: kṣīravināśaliṅgaṃ kṣīravināśakāraṇaṃ dadhyutapattiliṅgaṃ dadhyutpattikāraṇaṃ ca gṛhyate ato nānupalabdhiḥ/
GSP29nysvbh_u:4218: viparyayastu sphaṭikādiṣu dravyeṣu aparāparotpattīnāṃ na liṅgamastītyanuvṛttireveti // 14 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:4235: dadhni utpanne gṛhyamāṇe pūrvaṃ payodravyam avayavavibhāgebhyo
GSP29nysvbh_u:4245: abhyanujñāya na niṣkāraṇaṃ kṣīravināśaṃ dadhyutpādaṃ ca pratiṣedha
GSP29nysvbh_u:4260: tau tu na gṛhyete tasmānniradhiṣṭhānoyaṃ dṛṣṭānta
GSP29nysvbh_u:4285: vā guṇo jñānam-- teṣāṃ vināśe (api) jñānasya
GSP29nysvbh_u:4287: vinaṣṭe jñānam 'adrākṣam' iti. na ca jñātari
GSP29nysvbh_u:4295: na ca vijñātari naṣṭe pūrvopalabdheḥ smaraṇaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:4367: saṃnikarṣe samāne smṛtihetau sati na kāraṇasyāyaugapadyamastīti
GSP29nysvbh_u:4405: ubhayaṃ yujyate iti. utpādya vā dhārakaṃ prayatnaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:4412: yadā cireṇa tadā susmūrṣayā manasi dhāryamāṇe
GSP29nysvbh_u:4417: na smṛtihetuḥ-- śarīrasyopabhogāyatanatvāt = upabhogāyatanaṃ puruṣasya jñātuḥ śarīraṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:4431: manaḥ saṃyujyatām' iti manaḥ prerayati tadā
GSP29nysvbh_u:4432: smṛta evāsāvartho bhavati na smartavyaḥ, na
GSP29nysvbh_u:4443: yadā khalvayaṃ vyāsaktamanāḥ kvacid deśe śarkarayā
GSP29nysvbh_u:4446: dṛṣṭaṃ hi duḥkhaṃ duḥkhavedanaṃ ceti. tatrāyaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:4472: tāni ca na yugapad bhavanti tatkṛtā smṛtīnāṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:4480: sataḥ smṛtihetorasaṃvedanāt prātibheda samānābhimānaḥ = bahvarthaviṣaye vai cintāprabandhe
GSP29nysvbh_u:4483: cāyaṃ smartā sarvaṃ smṛtihetuṃ saṃvedayate = 'evaṃ me smṛtirutpanna' ityasaṃvedanāt
GSP29nysvbh_u:4531: ayaṃ khalu jānīte tāvat-- 'idaṃ me sukhasādhanam
GSP29nysvbh_u:4532: idaṃ me duḥkhasādhanam' iti. jñātaṃ svasya
GSP29nysvbh_u:4601: niyamena eva bhūtamātre jñānecchādveṣanimitte pravṛttinivṛttī svāśraye
GSP29nysvbh_u:4602: syātāṃ na tu bhavataḥ tasmāt prayojakāśritā jñānecchādveṣiprayatnāḥ prayojyāśraye tu pravṛttinivṛttī
GSP29nysvbh_u:4607: prāptam, omiti bruvataḥ pramāṇaṃ nāsti, yathā

GSP29nysvbh_u:7339: pratijñādīnāmakyavānāṃ yathālakṣaṇamarthavaśāt kramaḥ tatrāvayavaviparyāsena vacanam aprāptakālam asaṃbaddhārthaṃ nigrahasthānamiti // 11 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:7352: anyatrānuvādāt śabdapunaruktam arthapunaruktaṃ vā-- 'nityaḥ śabdaḥ nityaḥ śabdaḥ' iti śabdapunaruktam. arthapunaruktam-- 'anityaḥ śabdaḥ. nirodhadharmako dhvānaḥ' iti/
GSP29nysvbh_u:7368: NyS_5,2.16: vijñātasya pariṣadā trirabhihitasyāpy apratyuccāraṇam ananubhāṣaṇam //
GSP29nysvbh_u:7384: parapakṣapratiṣedhaḥ uttaraṃ tad yadā na pratipadyate ?
GSP29nysvbh_u:7390: 'idaṃ me karaṇīyaṃ vidyate tasminn avasite paścāt kathayiṣyāmīti (tat)
GSP29nysvbh_u:7392: ekanigrahāvasānāyāṃ kathāyāṃ svayameva kathāntaraṃ pratipadyate iti // 19 //
GSP29nysvbh_u:7396: NyS_5,2.20: svapakṣe doṣābhyupagamāt parapakṣe doṣaprasaṅgo matānujñā //
GSP29nysvbh_u:7405: paryanuyojyo nāma nigrahopapattyā codanīyaḥ. tasyopekṣaṇam = 'nigrahasthānaṃ prāpto 'sīty ananuyogaḥ/
GSP29nysvbh_u:7408: vacanīyam-- na khalu nigrahaṃ prāptaḥ svakaupīnaṃ
GSP29nysvbh_u:7424: nāsad ātmānaṃ labhate = nāsadutpadyate' iti siddhāntamabhyupetya
GSP29nysvbh_u:7434: prakṛtiḥ. yacca dharmāntaraṃ pravartate sa vikāra iti/
GSP29nysvbh_u:7445: na syāt, evaṃ pratyavasthito yadi sataścātmahānam asataścātmalābhamabhyupaiti ?
